name: The Quilted Jacket
description: Mens Diamond Quilted Jacket - navy body with burgundy cord trim, collar and embroidery. Slim fitting, two front pockets, 100% polyester outershell.

name: The Famous Polo - Muscle Fit - Panther Black with Pink under button contrast
description: The eldest of the James Lynch range is our first edition Garment: “The Famous Polo”. This finely made item was cut by one of Britain’s top pattern cutters to achieve superior style, shape and endurance. This garment is made up of 100% cotton pique with inner webbing around the neck for that luxury feel and fit. It really is made of stronger stuff so rest assured you can party all day and all night and still look like a champion. Under our branded buttons you’ll find our signature-contrasting colour that achieves that subtle stand out factor along with contrasting boutique logo embroidery. Being a muscle fit polo, it’s designed to tighten around the biceps and the lats to achieve that superior fit and enhanced shape. We’ve also embroidered 'J.LYNCH' on the upper back so as to ensure that you are 360° James Lynch. We’re entirely proud of our Polo and are sure that it meets the Original Lynch Tailors Finest Quality standards. This comes in the following colours; Tennis White, Panther Black, Royal-Blue, Red & Navy.

name: Soft Knitted Touch Screen Gloves
description:
Soft knitted touch screen gloves with winter pattern, interwoven with a special conductive material making them compatible with all touch screen devices. Unisex - one size fits all.
